text: $MSFT $AAPL $SPY lets see what this week brings

$MSFT In a way, the Activision acquisiton was smart but also stupid....smart for their Xbox platform but idk if the Xbox platform in it's version is here to stay a lot longer with the wave of the Metaverse. On the other hand, $FB was approached to buy out $ATVI but rejected the offer. Instead, FB is paying much less money to buy individual companies already popular in the metaverse. There is no guarantee that games like Candy Crush, Call of Duty, etc are gonna be exciting games that fit the metaverse. That is one reason I like FB's strategy a lot more. They are buying the best company/studios in each sector ...Health/exercise...Music, Different categroies of games. and building it into their own Oculus/Meta ecosystem

$SPY People bashing Gates and praising Musk are just as dull as those consuming every piece of shit Trump spews to his cult.
